MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL17 postcode area of St Asaph, affecting properties in High Street, Fron Haul and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:09AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40AM on 22nd January 2021
